item.description:
HI JRT Lovers,
If it's not too cold I am going to try to have a meetup at Amory park.
So far one person has said they will try to brave the cold! How about you?
If the temp is fridgid I will email on Friday to cancel. Check out new JRT puppy photos in the photo section. They wil be up later today!
Best, Faith

group.name: Jack Russell Terrier Boston Area Group

item.name: Jack Russell Terrier Boston Area Group July Meetup
